data.message:
very important issues for me
Can you remove the star next to the page name pls?
https://www.facebook.com/NecdetKayaOfficial 
And if there any restriction at page, pls remove restrictions.
And can u verified page?
This is famous Turkish Music Singer.
i'm page admin.
Thanks

replies.message: Hi Sibel. We don't currently accept requests for verified profiles from the public. In the meantime, you can submit a name change request. Keep in mind that you can only change your Page name once.  http://on.fb.me/1lT7IbB - Kristen
